cfc.pkg.description: Color conversion between any format, including OKLCH, OKLAB, HEX, RGB, HSL, and HWB (...) plus On-the-fly color conversion, color previews for OKLCH, OKLAB, LCH, and LAB and many more.
cfc.pkg.configs.precision.title: Precision
cfc.pkg.configs.precision.description: Precision (significant digits) for color formats that supports it like OKLCH, OKLAB, LCH, LAB, RGB, RGBA, HSL, HSLA, HWB, etc.
cfc.pkg.configs.defaultFormat.title: Default format
cfc.pkg.configs.forceAlpha.title: Force alpha
cfc.pkg.configs.forceAlpha.description: Always enable alpha (transparency) in color conversions.
cfc.pkg.configs.showModernColorPreview.d: Show modern color preview by placing a color square before the color code for OKLCH, OKLAB, LCH, LAB.
cfc.pkg.categories.conversion.title: CFC: Conversion
cfc.pkg.categories.history.title: CFC: Colors History
cfc.pkg.categories.favorites.title: CFC: Colors Favorites
cfc.pkg.commands.convertColor.title: CFC: Convert a color
cfc.pkg.commands.convertColor.descriptio: Convert a color or a selection of colors in one or more formats.
cfc.pkg.commands.clearHistory.title: Clear History
cfc.pkg.commands.clearFavorites.title: Clear Favorites
cfc.pkg.commands.refreshHistory.title: Refresh History
cfc.pkg.commands.refreshFavorites.title: Refresh Favorites
cfc.pkg.commands.addToFavorites.title: Add color to favorites
cfc.pkg.activityBar.colors.title: CFC: Color Formats Converter
cfc.pkg.view.colorsHistoryView.name: History of converted colors
cfc.pkg.view.colorsFavoritesView.name: Favorites colors
